attributes.action: Stop Jamie Oliver from manipulating fast food legislation
attributes.background: Jamie Oliver is  systematically taking away our right to eat fast food this is shown with the plans to stop buy 1 get 1 free pizza

rejection.details:
It is not the UK Government or Parliament's responsibility to say how an individual campaigns on a subject.

You could start a new petition setting out the changes to Government policy that you would like to see happen or stop.
